message: Can anyone comment on how steam games run on the i7 13" MBP? Mainly L4D2 and Portal.

I know that this recent run of MacBook pros (at least the lower end ones with no dedicated video card) took a little hit in gaming performance due to using intel integrated graphics vs. Nvidia.  Can't speak to the actual performance though.
don't own 1, but judging from specs and screen rez, it'll probably works..
I've got a late 2009 13" MBP, I haven't tried L4D2, but it runs Portal pretty nicely, both on itself & on my 24" Apple Cinema Display.
I have a late '08 13' MBP and portal ran just fine, so it should just fly with the new iron
